hibernate-mapping.query: update TLMORM00029 remitbribl set remitbribl.IblSerial=:serial, remitbribl.UpdatedDate=:updateddate, remitbribl.UpdatedUserId=:updateduserId where remitbribl.BranchCode =:drawerbank and remitbribl.Currency=:currencycode and remitbribl.Active = true
select new remitbribldto( r.Id) from TLMORM00029 as r where (r.BranchCode =: branchCode and r.SourceBranchCode= : sourceBr and r.Currency=: cur) and r.Active = true

select new remitbribldto( r.Id, r.BranchCode, r.TelaxCharges, r.TTSerial, r.DraftSerial, r.StateCode, r.DrawingAccount, r.EncashAccount, r.IBSComAccount, r.TelaxAccount, r.IblSerial, r.IRPOAccount, r.UniqueIdentifier, r.SourceBranchCode, r.Currency, r.Active, r.TS, r.CreatedDate, r.CreatedUserId, r.UpdatedDate, r.UpdatedUserId ) from TLMORM00029 as r where r.BranchCode = :branchCode and r.SourceBranchCode= :SourceBr and r.Currency= :cur and r.Active = true
update TLMORM00029 r set r.Active = false, r.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, r.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where r.Id = :id and r.Active = true
select new remitbribldto( r.IblSerial, r.Active ) from TLMORM00029 as r where r.BranchCode = :drawerbank and r.SourceBranchCode = :SourceBr and r.Currency = :currencycode and r.Active = true

select new remitbribldto( r.Id, r.BranchCode, r.TelaxCharges, r.TTSerial, r.DraftSerial, r.StateCode, r.DrawingAccount, r.EncashAccount, r.IBSComAccount, r.TelaxAccount, r.IblSerial, r.IRPOAccount, r.UniqueIdentifier, r.SourceBranchCode, r.Currency, r.Active, r.TS, r.CreatedDate, r.CreatedUserId, r.UpdatedDate, r.UpdatedUserId ) from TLMORM00029 as r where r.Id = :id and r.SourceBranchCode= :SourceBr and r.Active = true

update TLMORM00029 remitbribl set remitbribl.IblSerial=:serial, remitbribl.UpdatedDate=:updateddate, remitbribl.UpdatedUserId=:updateduserId where remitbribl.BranchCode =:drawerbank and remitbribl.SourceBranchCode = :SourceBr and remitbribl.Currency=:currencycode and remitbribl.Active = true
